item.description:
Eight to the Bar will be coming to Narragansett Cafe (the Ganny) for a great evening of music and dancing ! This will be another mostly Motown dance...all of our favorite songs.
ETTB plays from 9:30pm - 1am. If possible, try to arrive earlier (8pm on) to find better parking. I hope to be there by 8pm.

http://www.eighttothe...

Is anyone up for dinner before the show? Either at the Narr. Cafe or one of the nice restaurants in the area.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Great night of music and dancing to Eight to the Bar
